title: Academic Set 13 — Remote Clinics & Ageing Cities
description: Bar chart on telehealth appointments and a problem-solution essay on ageing urban populations.

task1.title: Telehealth appointments in four regions
task1.prompt: The bar chart shows the percentage of primary healthcare appointments conducted via telehealth in four regions (North America, Europe, Asia-Pacific, and Africa) in 2015, 2020, and 2025 (projected). Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.
hints: Compare the rate of increase across the three time points.
Highlight which region is expected to see the greatest growth by 2025.
Group regions with similar adoption levels when describing the data.

task2.title: Problem-solution essay — Ageing cities
task2.prompt: In many cities, the proportion of residents over 65 is growing rapidly. What challenges does this create, and what measures could local governments take to support older citizens?
outline: Introduction: paraphrase the topic and indicate that you will discuss problems and solutions.
Body paragraph 1: outline challenges such as pressure on healthcare, housing, and transport.
Body paragraph 2: propose practical measures like age-friendly infrastructure and community services.
Conclusion: summarise the key solutions and emphasise proactive planning.
